keyword.name: mustBeA
keyword.description: Checks that input value comes from one of specified classes.

keyword.name: mustBeColumn
keyword.description: Checks that value is a column vector or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeFile
keyword.description: Checks that input path refers to file.

keyword.name: mustBeFinite
keyword.description: Checks that value is finite or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeFloat
keyword.description: Checks that value is floating-point or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeFolder
keyword.description: Checks that input path refers to folder.

keyword.name: mustBeGreaterThan
keyword.description: Checks that value is greater than another value or issue error.

keyword.name: mustBeGreaterThanOrEqual
keyword.description: Checks that value is greater than or equal to another value or issue error.

keyword.name: mustBeInRange
keyword.description: Checks that value is in the specified range.

keyword.name: mustBeInteger
keyword.description: Checks that value is integer or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeLessThan
keyword.description: Checks that value is less than another value or issue error.

keyword.name: mustBeLessThanOrEqual
keyword.description: Checks that value is less than or equal to another value or issue error.

keyword.name: mustBeLogical
keyword.description: Checks that value is logical or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeLogicalScalar
keyword.description: Checks that value is logical scalar or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeMatrix
keyword.description: Checks that value is a matrix or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeMember
keyword.description: Checks that value is member of specified array or issue error.

keyword.name: mustBeNegative
keyword.description: Checks that value is negative or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeNonempty
keyword.description: Checks that value is nonempty or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeNonmissing
keyword.description: Checks that value is not missing.

keyword.name: mustBeNonNan
keyword.description: Checks that value is not NaN.

keyword.name: mustBeNonnegative
keyword.description: Checks that value is nonnegative or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeNonpositive
keyword.description: Checks that value is non positive or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeNonSparse
keyword.description: Checks that value is not sparse.

keyword.name: mustBeNonZero
keyword.description: Checks that value is not zero.

keyword.name: mustBeNonzeroLengthText
keyword.description: Checks that value is text with nonzero length or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeNumeric
keyword.description: Checks that value is numeric or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeNumericOrLogical
keyword.description: Checks that input is numeric or logical.

keyword.name: mustBePositive
keyword.description: Checks that value is positive or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeReal
keyword.description: Checks that value is real.

keyword.name: mustBeRow
keyword.description: Checks that value is a row vector or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeScalarOrEmpty
keyword.description: Checks that value is scalar or empty or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeSparse
keyword.description: Checks that value is a sparse matrix or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeText
keyword.description: Checks that value is piece of text or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeTextScalar
keyword.description: Checks that value is single piece of text or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeValidVariableName
keyword.description: Checks that value is valid variable name or raise an error.

keyword.name: mustBeVector
keyword.description: Checks that value is vector or raise an error.
